snippet.title: Mitoza | It’s not a game. It’s a toy. | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Mitoza - it all starts with a seed 🌱

Download and explore the amazing adventure created by Gal Mamalya on:

🐇 iOS: http://apps.apple.com/app/id1533173177
🐘 Android: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.GalMamalya.Mitoza
🛸 Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/1516240/Mitoza 
🥚 itchio: https://secondmaze.itch.io/mitoza

Not to mention: it’s free!

Big thanks to Gal Mamalya (https://baboon.co.il) for partnering up with us and for letting us remake and publish his amazing piece of art onto new platforms. It might be a great start to something new. Secondly, we want to thank Jeroen Wimmers (https://www.jeroenwimmers.com) for the amazing effort on the programming side and, last but not least, a huge thanks to the awesome Bob Rafferty (https://www.bobrafferty.co.uk)for putting together this awesome trailer, he is truly a man of many talents! 

Help the Mitoza seed sprout and flourish by leaving a review!
Let us know what you think in the comments and reviews, and some of you might win a special postcard!

Thank you all for your awesome support,

Second Maze Team

Like and follow:
📷  Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/secondmaze/
📘  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/secondmazestudios
🐦  Twitter: https://twitter.com/second_maze
And subscribe to our mailing list: http://eepurl.com/bhphw1​
